summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of Erie Avenue, from Yesler Way to a point approximately 200 feet south of the south margin of East Alder Street (south end of existing bridge); by grading and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 78826 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
